mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.EXCHNG_CD AS exchngCd , SUM(NOW_AMT) OVER(PARTITION BY EXCHNG_CD) AS nowAmt , (SELECT SUM(NOW_AMT) FROM TRADE_HIST WHERE RGSTRN_DT = #{rgstrnDt} AND SN = '1' AND EXCHNG_CD = A.EXCHNG_CD) AS startAmt , SUM(NOW_AMT) OVER(PARTITION BY EXCHNG_CD) - (SELECT SUM(NOW_AMT) FROM TRADE_HIST WHERE RGSTRN_DT = #{rgstrnDt} AND SN = '1' AND EXCHNG_CD = A.EXCHNG_CD) AS diffAmt FROM TRADE_HIST A INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT MAX(SN) OVER(PARTITION BY EXCHNG_CD ORDER BY SN DESC) AS SN , EXCHNG_CD AS exchngCd FROM TRADE_HIST WHERE RGSTRN_DT = #{rgstrnDt}) B ON A.SN = B.SN AND A.EXCHNG_CD = B.exchngCd WHERE RGSTRN_DT = #{rgstrnDt} AND EMAIL = #{email}
